form.instruction:
Run the file focustest.txt through your morphological parser and then run the syntactic parser on the output. Check the log for the results and note any changes you need to make to the lexicon or to answers about the order of elements in the phrase structure rules. Make the changes as needed and rerun.
Please check off this section now in 'Contents' and then proceed to
Exclamations and Greetings when you are ready.
